contentsString

public java.lang.String contentsString()
Description copied from class: online.common.StockArt
this is the default method called to help build a meaningful, brief value for toString. The default is usually the file name from which the artwork was loaded.

Overrides:
contentsString in class online.common.StockArt

a reasonably brief name string
